sense.def:
A detail
je posamezna lastnost ali del nečesa.

seg.quote: I can still remember every single detail of that night.
He described it down to the smallest detail.

sense.def:
Detail
vsebuje majhne lastnosti, ki jih navadno ne opazimo.

seg.quote: Attention to detail is vital in this job.

sense.def:
Details about someone or something
so drobci podatkov o nekom ali nečem.

seg.quote: You can get details of nursery schools from the local authority.

sense.def:
To detail things
pomeni stvari našteti ali o njih dati vse podatke;
